Title: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to rename the Burnside subway station the Burnside Bronx Community College subway station
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to rename the Burnside subway station the Burnside-Bronx Community College subway station.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the metropolitan transportation authority to rename the Burnside subway station the Burnside-Bronx Community College subway station; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
